original: Ågren, Nils Rickard, apotekare, Skänninge, f. 15/4/02 i Linköp. av hov-r :not. Seth Mauritz Å. o. Anna Gus-tavs’s0n. G. 29 nu. Agda Eva Viktoria Johansson. Barn: Clas Rickard f. 33, Eva Maria 34. — Stud:ex. i Linköp. 22, farm. kand. 29, apot:ex. 33. Elev v. apot. Vasen i Linköp. 25-28, anst. v. Mården i Sthlm 29-31 o. 3^-37, därefter åter v. Vasen i Linköp., priv. å apot. i Skänninge fr. 46.
translated: Ågren, Nils Rickard, pharmacist, Skänninge, b. 15/4/02 in Linköping, son of Seth Mauritz Å. and Anna Gustavsdotter. Married at the age of 29 to Agda Eva Viktoria Johansson. Children: Clas Rickard b. 1933, Eva Maria b. 1934. Completed secondary school in Linköping in 1922, completed a degree in pharmacy in 1929, obtained a license to practice as a pharmacist in 1933. Worked as an apprentice at Vasen pharmacy in Linköping from 1925-1928, employed at Mården pharmacy in Stockholm from 1929-1931 and 1933-1937, thereafter returned to Vasen pharmacy in Linköping. Also worked privately at a pharmacy in Skänninge from 1946 onwards.
